name: Advanced Weapons Pack
author: LazyWizard
description:
A collection of weapons utilizing custom effects code.

This weapon pack currently contains:
 - The Impaler, a medium ballistic projectile that pierces through targets.
 - The Mjolnir, a small energy weapon that fires bolts of lightning at your foes.
 - The Thor, a medium energy weapon that fires bolts of chain lightning at your foes.
 - The Scrambler, a very weak small energy point defense weapon that has a chance of converting missiles to your side.

Requires LazyLib 1.3 or higher.
